rootCause: Systematic and persistent intrusions into sensitive U.S. government and military networks.
impact: Exfiltration of terabytes of sensitive data from organizations like Lockheed Martin, Sandia National Laboratories, and NASA over several years.
description: Titan Rain was the designation given by the U.S. government to a series of coordinated cyberattacks on American computer systems starting in 2003. Believed to be orchestrated by a Chinese state-sponsored group, it was one of the earliest recognized large-scale cyber espionage campaigns.
